function.name: Mirror Added
function.description: This function is called by the Meter Mirror plugin whenever a RequestMirror command is successfully processed.

function.name: Mirror Removed
function.description: This function is called by the Meter Mirror plugin whenever a RemoveMirror command is successfully processed.

function.name: Reporting Complete
function.description: This function is called by the Meter Mirror plugin after processing an AttributeReportingStatus attribute set to ReportingComplete. If the application needs to do any post attribute reporting processing it can do it from within this callback.
